job_description:
• Minimum QualificationsBachelors in Electrical / Computer EngineeringExpertise with hardware bring-up and bench-top measurements with lab equipment (e.
• Digital oscilloscope, logic analyzer, power supply) for signal and power integrityStrong communication and people skills.
• Able to work with cross functional teams on a regular basis.
• Basic understanding of both low-speed and high-speed digital interfacesFamiliarity with power electronics, especially DC-DC converters.
